text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
November 12, 1957
Raymond Cheydleiar
Assistant Director
Station WFSU-FM
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Ray:
Enclosed is a copy of the letter of invitation that went to the first
20 men on the list Adkins sent me (except for Crary, which means we
actually went down through the 21st name).
I talked to Keith and he agreed that, if we would handle the expense
vouchers for the participants, OSU would not charge the $600 administrative.
This, plus the $360 contingency, plus the original $1500 allocated for
participant travel, will give us $2^60 which is just about what I figured
the travel for the participants and committee would come to.
One slight problem is that, according to Keith, the 20 for whcM room
and board was originally figured, included participants and committee.
This means a slight increase in room and board over the original budget.
However, I believe that I figured the travel generously enough to allow
for this â€” at least I hope so.
Thanks for your help during this hectic week.
Regards,
Associate Director
HEH/dfc
GO: Gale Adkins
Enclosure
